resources.string:
Table contains:
 order of letter in alphabet,
 letter,
 code in phonetic alphabet,
 morse code,
 semaphore signal,
 braille code,
 maritime signal flag.

Decodes and encodes given text using Atbash cipher.
Substitution:
A ↔ Z
B ↔ Y
C ↔ X
D ↔ W
…

Search names and dates in calendar by regular expressions, e.g:
".9" → day ended in 9 in every month
" 9" → 9th day in every month
"19" → 19th day in every month
"d.r" → names with pattern d.r
".o[nr]" → names with pattern .o[nr]

Patterns ignors accents and they are not case sensitive.
Maritime signal flags with their meaning and letters.
Analyze given text. Counts frequency of letters, bigrams and trigrams.
Decode given string in morse code to plain text.\n/ is a separator, Del removes last character.

Decodes and encodes given text using ROT13 cipher.
Substitution:
cycle by 13 places, e.g
A ↔ N
B ↔ O
C ↔ P
…
Tap dots on border of image to display letter. Figure is determined from two last selected dots.
Search streets in chosen city by regular expression. Patterns ignor accents and they are not case sensitive.
Table for simple conversion from letters to braille signs.
Encode given plain text to morse code.
Encode and decode text using Vigenere cipher in alphabet with numbering letters from 0 or 1.
